solution_line_template: In a day, Mr. Jesiah's total income from the sale of the milk is ${price_per_gallon}/gallon * {gallons_per_day} gallons/day = $<<{price_per_gallon}*{gallons_per_day}={daily_income}>>{daily_income}/day
In June, his total income is ${daily_income}/day * {days_in_june} days = $<<{daily_income}*{days_in_june}={monthly_income_from_sales}>>{monthly_income_from_sales}
The net income from the sale is ${monthly_income_from_sales} - ${monthly_expenses} = $<<{monthly_income_from_sales}-{monthly_expenses}={net_income}>>{net_income}
